summary.description:
A Metabolomics Support Package for Untargeted Mass Spectrometry.

A Metabolomics Support Package for Untargeted Mass Spectrometery.

MetumpX is a Ubuntu based software package that facilitate easy download and installation of about 89 tools related to standard Untargeted Metabolomics Mass Spectrometery pipeline.

Installation • Authors • License • Revision History
summary.name: MetumpX
